Question:
Ese ubwicanyi bwakozwe na Minisitiri w'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu X mu mahanga ni igikorwa cy'ubugizi bwa nabi cyangwa ni igikorwa cy'ubugizi bwa nabi?
A.Iyi gahunda ni igikorwa cy'abaturage (Jure Imperii)
B.Iyi myitwarire ntiyigeze igira ubudahangarwa
C.Iyi myitwarire ni igikorwa cy'umuntu ku giti cye (Jure Gestionis)
D.Iyi myitwarire ni iy'abaturage ariko irindwa n'ubudahangarwa
GivenAnswer:
Igikorwa cy'ubwicanyi bwakozwe na Minisitiri w'Ubutegetsi bw'Igihugu mu mahanga bishobora kuba igikorwa cy'ubugizi bwa nabi cyangwa cy'umuntu ku giti cye, byibanda ku mpamvu n'ingaruka zacyo.

Niba ubwicanyi bwakozwe mu izina ry'igihugu no mu rwego rw'inshingano ze nk'umuyobozi, bishobora kuba igikorwa cy'ubugizi bwa nabi (Jure Imperii) kandi igihugu cyangwa se cyarindwa n'ubudahangarwa (igisubizo D). Ariko niba yabikozehowemwene ku bwizerwe bwe, bishobora kuba igikorwa cy'umuntu ku giti cye (Jure Gestionis) kandi ntacyo gihugu cyarindwa (igisubizo C).

Icyo gihe, igisubizo C cyangwa D ari byo byemerwa, byibanda ku mpamvu n'ingaruka z'igikorwa cy'ubwicanyi. Igisubizo A si ngombwa kuko igikorwa cy'ubwicanyi nticyari igikorwa cy'abaturage bahuje. Igisubizo B si ngombwa kuko ubudahangarwa bw'igihugu bushobora kubaho cyangwa kutabaho, byibanda ku mpamvu n'ingaruka z'igikorwa.

Question:
Abanyeshuri barimo gukora imyitozo yo gutandukanya ibimera isaba gukoresha icyumba cya chromatography gifunze hamwe na acetone nto munsi y'icyumba. Mu mabwiriza y'umutekano wa acetone harimo ijambo rivuga ko ari ijisho n'uruhu rudashobora guhumeka kandi rufite umwuka ushobora gutwika. Ni ibihe bintu by'umutekano abanyeshuri bagomba kwirinda mu gihe cyo gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri?
A.Ahabanza Amakuru Amakuru y'Imyidagaduro Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu yavuze ko umuyobozi
B.Gushyira icyumba cy'icyumba cy'
C.Kwambara imyenda y'ibara ry
D.Kwambara inkweto n'inkweto zo mu bwoko bwa nitrile no gufunga kontineri zose za acetone
GivenAnswer:
D. Kwambara inkweto n'inkweto zo mu bwoko bwa nitrile no gufunga kontineri zose za acetone

Iyo bakora imyitozo igamije gutandukanya ibimera bakoresha acetone, abanyeshuri bagomba kwirinda kuyihuma cyangwa kuyikuramo umwuka. Bityo, ingamba z'umutekano zikenewe harimo:

- Kwambara inkweto zibuze acetone kugera ku mbavu, nko kwambara inkweto zo mu bwoko bwa nitrile.
- Gufunga neza kontineri zose zifunze acetone kugira ngo umwuka utabure hanze.
- Gukora imyitozo mu cyumba gifunze neza kugira ngo umwuka utabure hanze.
- Kwirinda gufata ibyokurya cyangwa ibyokunywa mu cyumba cy'imyitozo.
- Gusukura neza ibyatandukanye byose byangijwe n'acetone.

Kwirinda kuyihuma no kuyikuramo umwuka ni ngombwa kuko acetone ari ijisho n'uruhu rudashobora guhumeka kandi rufite umwuka ushobora gutwika iyo ryahumewe cyangwa ryakuweho umwuka.

Question:
Iki kibazo kibazwa ku makuru akurikira.
Icya mbere tugomba kuvuga ko cosmos ari spherical mu buryo, bitewe ahanini n'uko ubu buryo ari uburyo bwuzuye bwose, ni bwo bwuzuye kurusha ubundi bwose, bitewe n'uko ikora uburyo bwa capacious kurusha ubundi, bukwiriye cyane kugira no kubungabunga byose; Ni ukubera ko ibice byose by'isanzure ari byo, ari byo izuba, ukwezi n'imibumbe bigaragara muri ubu buryo; Cyangwa kubera ko ibyo byose bikorwa kugira ngo ibyo bikorwa bigerweho, nk'uko bigaragara mu gihe cy'amazi n'ibindi bice by'amazi mu gihe bagerageza kwisobanura. Nta muntu n'umwe ushidikanya ko ubwo buryo ari ubw'imibiri yo mu ijuru. ...
Ikindi kandi ngo ni uko igihugu gifite ubushobozi bwo kumenya amakuru y'ubuzima bw'isonga y'ibihugu byombi, kuko gifite ubushobozi bwo kumenya amakuru y'ibanze. Nubwo kubera uburebure bw'imisozi n'agahinda gakabije k'ibibaya, ntihashobora kumvikana, ariko ibyo ntibigira ingaruka ku miterere rusange y'isi. ...
Nk'uko bimaze kugaragazwa ko isi ifite ubwoko bw'ahantu runaka, tugomba kureba niba na yo ihuye n'ubwo buryo, n'aho isi ituye mu isanzure. ... Birumvikana ko benshi mu banditsi bemera ko isi ikiri hagati y'isanzure, kandi ko bidashoboka kandi bisekeje gutekereza ikinyuranyo. Ariko niba iki kibazo gifite uburemere bw'ubwitonzi, bizagaragara ko iki kibazo kitarakemuka, bityo nta buryo bwo gufatwa mu buryo bworoshye. Impinduka zose z'ahantu ziteganyijwe, ni ukuvuga, ku kugenda kw'ikintu cyagaragajwe cyangwa cy'umugenzuzi, cyangwa ku ngendo zombi. ... Ubu ni bwo buturutse ku isi, ni uko ijuru ry'ijuru rireba, kandi rikomoka ku maso yacu. Niyo mpamvu niba isi itagomba guhinduka, iyi myigaragambyo igomba kuba mu bintu byose byo hanze y'isi, ariko mu cyerekezo kinyuranye n'iyo ibintu byose byo ku isi bimukiye, kandi muri ubwo bwoko ni impinduramatwara ya buri munsi. Ibi rero bikaba bifite ingaruka ku isanzure ryose, ni ukuvuga ibintu byose byo hanze y'isi uretse isi ubwayo. Icyakora, niba umuntu yagombye kwemera ko iyo myigaragambyo itari idasanzwe ku ijuru, ahubwo ko isi yari iturutse mu burengerazuba ikava mu burasirazuba, kandi niba ibyo byatekerezwaga neza ku bijyanye n'uko izuba rirasira kandi rirasira, ukwezi n'inyenyeri, byavumbuwe ko ari ko ibintu by'ukuri."
Nicolas Copernic, impinduramatwara y'imibiri yo mu ijuru, 1543
Icyo gice gishobora gukoreshwa nk'ikimenyetso cy'uko Copernicus itandukanye n'abahanga mu bya filozofiya b'abahanga mu bya filozofiya bo mu gihe cye cya Aristotelian kuko yavuze ko ibyo yavuze.
A.Bye Bye Sasmos
B.Isi ni iy'umusomo
C.Bye bye geostatic
D.Ubutaka ntabwo ari ubushozi
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo kiramutse ari C. Bye bye geostatic

Mu gice cy'inganji wavuye, Copernic yavugaga ku myigaragambyo y'isi n'ibintu byo mu ijuru, agaragaza ko isi ntiyari icy'igikundiro cy'isanzure nk'uko byasanganywe na Aristotele n'abandi bahanga bo mu gihe cye, ahubwo ko ari yo yagendaga mu isanzure. Question:

Question:
Menya igipimo cya H+(aq) kiri muri 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH. (1 × 10.)
A.1 × 10-10 M
B.1 × 10-9 M
C.1 × 10-3 M
D.1 × 10-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo ni C. 1 × 10^-3 M

Phenol ni umurongo w'imyanda y'ibisigazwa bifite imibare ya hydrogène (H+) idasanzwe. Iyo mibare y'imyanda ya H+ ivuye ku muri phenol itera ko igipimo cya H+ kiba hejuru mu mavumbakintu.

Iyo phenol ihuye n'amazi, igice cyayo gito kiba gifite imibare ya H+ nk'uko bikurikira:

C6H5OH + H2O ⇌ C6H5O- + H3O+

Iyo mibare ya H+ ivuye muri phenol ni yo iterwa n'igipimo cya H+ mu mavumbakintu. Iyo mibare ya H+ itera ko igipimo cya H+ kiba hejuru mu mavumbakintu, bityo igipimo cya OH- kiba gito.

Mu gihe cyo gusuzuma igipimo cya H+ mu mavumbakintu ya phenol, hashingirwaho ku mubare wa Ka (constant acide) wa phenol. Ka ya phenol ni 1.0 × 10^-10.

Ku bw'izo mpamvu, igipimo cya H+ mu mavumbakintu ya 1.0 M phenol kiba 1 × 10^-3 M.

Question:
Sobanukirwa uburebure bw'uburebure bw'inyuguti y = ln x iri hagati y'ibice by'ahantu = 1/2 na y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
Kugira ngo tubone uburebure bw'inyuguti y = ln x iri hagati y'ibice by'ahantu = 1/2 na y = 1, tuzakoresha iyi nteganyanyigisho:

∫(1/√(1+y'^2)) dy

Iyo nteganyanyigisho ibarwa hagati y'ibice by'ahantu y1 na y2.

Muri iyi ngingo, y1 = ln(1/2) = -0.693 kandi y2 = ln(1) = 0

Niba turishyira muri iyo nteganyanyigisho, turabona:

∫(1/√(1+(ln'x)^2)) d(ln x) ivamo ln x hagati ya -0.693 na 0

Iyo myibaruro ni: 
∫(1/√(1+1/x^2)) dx ivamo x hagati ya 1/2 na 1

Iyo ni yo myibaruro y'inyuguti y = ln x iri hagati y'ibice by'ahantu = 1/2 na y = 1.

Tuzayibarura:
= [arcsinh(1/x)]_{1/2}^1
= arcsinh(1) - arcsinh(1/2)
≈ 0.88 - 0.48
= 0.40

Igisubizo ni D. 1.36

Question:
Kugenda ku muvuduko wa mbere wa 1.5 × 10-6 m/s, proton yinjira mu karere ka magnetique ihoraho ya magnitude 1.5 T. Niba vector ya mbere y'umuvuduko wa proton ikora imfuruka ya 30° hamwe n'ikibuga cya magnetique, kubara umuvuduko wa proton 4 nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga cya magnetique.
A.5.0 × 10 6 m/s
B.7.5 × 10-6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10-6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10-6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Kugira ngo tubone umuvuduko wa proton nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga cya magnetique, dukeneye gukoresha imibare n'amahame ya fisiki.

Igihe proton yinjira mu kibuga cya magnetique, izagira umuvuduko w'imfuruka (umuvuduko w'imfuruka = qvBsinθ/m) aho:

q = ikirango cya proton (1.6 × 10^-19 C)
v = umuvuduko mbere yo kwinjira (1.5 × 10^-6 m/s)
B = ubushobozi bw'ikibuga cya magnetique (1.5 T)
θ = imfuruka hagati y'umuvuduko mbere yo kwinjira n'ikibuga cya magnetique (30°)
m = ubwizagara bwa proton (1.67 × 10^-27 kg)

Tuvuge umuvuduko w'imfuruka ari v_perp.

v_perp = qvBsinθ/m
        = (1.6 × 10^-19 C)(1.5 × 10^-6 m/s)(1.5 T)sin30°/(1.67 × 10^-27 kg)
        = 3.0 × 10^-6 m/s

Umuvuduko wa nyuma wo kwinjira (v_nyuma) uzaba ari umuvuduko w'imfuruka (v_perp) hamwe n'umuvuduko mbere yo kwinjira (v) ukorewe imfuruka ya 90° kuko umuvuduko w'imfuruka ukora imfuruka ya 90° n'umuvuduko mbere yo kwinjira.

v_nyuma = √(v_perp^2 + v^2)
         = √((3.0 × 10^-6 m/s)^2 + (1.5 × 10^-6 m/s)^2)
         = 3.35 × 10^-6 m/s

Ni yo mpamvu igisubizo nicyo C. 1.5 × 10^-6 m/s

GivenAnswer:

Question:
Umukandida wandika ni Umunyamerika ukomoka muri Mexique kandi afite igitekerezo cy'uko akeneye umubare munini w'abatoye muri Mexique kugira ngo atsinde amatora. Kubera iyo mpamvu, umuyobozi we wo kwiyamamaza, afata icyemezo cyo kohereza buri muntu wiyandikishije muri Mexique ikimenyetso cy'amarira, gifite izina n'ibiro by'umukandida ayobora. Kubera ko abaturage benshi bo muri Mexique badafite ubumenyi bwo gusoma no kwandika icyongereza, umuyobozi w'ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza yemeza ko abenshi mu batora bazaba bafite ikibazo cyo kwandika izina n'ibiro by'umukandida ku matora. Kubera iyo mpamvu, umuyobozi w'ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza yatangiye ubukangurambaga bwinshi bw'itangazamakuru kugira ngo amenyeshe abatoye uburyo bwo gukoresha ibishushanyo mu matora. Amezi atanu mbere y'amatora, umuyobozi w'amatora yavuze ko komite yo kwiyamamaza y'umukandida ko ibyapa byo gusenya bitubahiriza amategeko ya leta. Mu ibaruwa ye, uyu muyobozi asobanura ko abayobozi b'amatora ya leta ari ibitekerezo by'uko ari ngombwa ko abashobora gutora bandika izina ry'umukandida mu ikaramu. Avuga ko ibyo bikoresho bitujuje ibisabwa n'amategeko. Nyuma y'ibyumweru bitatu, umukandida yatanze ikirego mu rukiko rw'akarere ku bayobozi b'amatora ya leta bavuga ko gusobanura itegeko rya leta binyuranyije n'Itegeko Nshinga rya Amerika. None se ni nde muri aba bayobozi b'inzego z'ubutegetsi bw'igitugu, niba ari we ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga ko ubutegetsi bw'igitugu
A.Abitabiriye amatora mu batora muri Mexique bo muri Mexique badafite ubumenyi mu cyongereza, bari munsi ya 1% by'amajwi yose muri leta yose mu matora aheruka.
B.Itegeko nshinga rya Leta risaba ko buri cyumba cy'itora gifite ikaramu y'ikaramu kugira ngo byorohereze kwandika mu matora.
C.Kubera ko umubare munini w'amajwi yanditse muri rusange wongera igihe gikenewe cyo kubara amajwi yose, ni ngombwa gushyiraho amajwi nk'aya mu buryo bumwe.
D.Ubushobozi bwo gutora ni bwinshi cyane hamwe n'ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga.
GivenAnswer:
Muri iyi nkuru, hari impaka iri hagati y'umukandida w'amatora n'ubuyobozi bw'amatora ya leta ku kibazo cy'uko abatora bashobora gukoresha ibishushanyo (ikimenyetso cy'amarira) mu matora. 

Umukandida afite igitekerezo cyo kohereza abatora be ikimenyetso cy'amarira kigaragaza izina rye n'ibiro bye kugira ngo babyandike ku matora, kubera ko benshi mu batora badafite ubumenyi bwo gusoma no kwandika icyongereza. Ariko ubuyobozi bw'amatora ya leta buvuga ko bitujuje ibisabwa n'amategeko, ko abatora bagomba kwandika izina ry'umukandida mu ikaramu.

Muri iyi mpaka, nta n'umwe muri aba bayobozi ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga ko ubutegetsi bw'igitugu:

A. Iyi ntego si yo kuvuga ku batora bo muri Mexique badafite ubumenyi mu cyongereza, ahubwo ni ukuvuga ku batora bose bo muri Mexique.

B. Ntabwo Itegeko Nshinga rivuga ku bikenewe mu cyumba cy'itora, ahubwo rivuga ku burenganzira bwo gutora.

C. Ikibazo si ukwongera igihe cyo kubara amajwi, ahubwo ni uko abatora bashobora gukoresha ibishushanyo mu matora.

D. Ntabwo ikibazo kivugwa ni ubushobozi bwo gutora hamwe n'ikoranabuhanga, ahubwo ni uko abatora bashobora gukoresha ibishushanyo mu matora.

Impaka iri hagati y'umukandida ushaka ko abatora bashobora gukoresha ibishushanyo, n'ubuyobozi bw'amatora buvuga ko bitujuje ibisabwa n'amategeko. Nta muyobozi ufite uburenganzira bwo kuvuga ko ubutegetsi bw'igitugu muri iyi nkuru.

Question:

Ubushakashatsi bwinshi bwagaragaje ko hari uruhare rw'imikorere itandukanye y'imiterere ya dopamine mu buntu ku kibazo cya schizophrenia. Iyo dopamine irenze urugero mu bice bimwe by'ubwonko, bishobora gutuma habaho imyumvire itari yo n'imyitwarire itari ngombwa, ari byo bimwe mu bimenyetso bya schizophrenia.

Hari n'izindi mpamvu zishobora kugira uruhare ku kibazo cya schizophrenia nk'imiterere y'imyumvire, imibereho myiza, n'imiterere y'imyumvire y'umuryango. GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo kiramutse ari C. Kongera amahirwe yo gukorana n'abaturage

Question:

Muri iyi nzira, umuti wiza kurusha abandi ni Carbamazepine (igisubizo A). Carbamazepine ni umuti usanzwe ukoreshwa mu gukumira no gukumira ububabare bwo mu mutwe bwa trigeminal neuralgia.

D. Topiramate: Ni umuti ukumira indwara z'umutwe, ariko ntiwukoreshwa cyane mu gukumira ububabare bwo mu mutwe bwa trigeminal neuralgia.

Ni yo mpamvu Carbamazepine (A) ari yo yaba igisubizo kiza kurusha ibindi muri iyi nzira.

D. Gukunda kwiga indimi bishobora kuba ari inkingi yo kumenya amakuru mashya kuko ubumenyi bw'indimi buguha ubushobozi bwo gusoma no kumva amakuru atandukanye.

Muri rusange, kwiga indimi bishobora kugufasha kumenya amakuru mashya, ariko ntibivuze ko ari byo byonyine bishingira kuri ubwo bumenyi.

Question:
Supermarket yari iherutse kongera gufungura nyuma y'ibyumweru bibiri ifunze kugira ngo ivugururwa. Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Mbere nibwo umugore yari agiye kugura ubwo yaguye mu buryo butunguranye maze avunika ukuguru. Nyuma yaho, uyu mugore yagejeje ikirego muri supermarket kubera ibikomere bye bwite. Mu myambaro ye, uyu mugore yavuze ko yaguye hejuru y'igikapu cy'ibara cyari giryamye muri imwe mu nzira. Mu rubanza, uyu mugore yahamagaye undi mukiriya kugira ngo atange ubuhamya ko ubwo yari agiye kugura, yumvise thud, ahindukira abona uwo mugore agwa hasi. Yavuze kandi ko yabonye icyuma cy'ibara ry Nyuma yo gusuzumwa, umukiriya yahuye n'umunyamategeko wa supermarket. Abajijwe igitekerezo cye ku cyateye uyu mugore kugwa, umukiriya yagize ati "Yaguye kubera ko yaguye ku mufuka." Icyakora, yavuze ko mu by'ukuri atigeze abona uyu mugore agenda mu kibuga. Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu yabajije umukiriya ikibazo gikurikira: "Niba utabonye umugore agenda mu mufuka, wamenya ute ko yaguye kubera ibyo?" Yagize ati "Kubera ko umukobwa wanjye wari ugiye kugurana nanjye yambwiye nyuma ko yabonye umugore agenda hejuru y'inkweto." Umuyobozi w'Akarere ka Nyabihu yavuze ko agiye gusubiza igisubizo cya nyuma cy'umukiriya. Niba umucamanza arenze ku cyemezo cy'umushinjacyaha kandi yemerera igisubizo cy'umukiriya guhagarara, birashoboka cyane ko biterwa n'uko
A.Igisubizo cy'umukiriya cyatumiwe n'ikibazo cy'umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w'akarere.
B.Igisubizo cy'umukiriya cyari gishingiye ku bumenyi bw'ibanze.
C.Igisubizo cy'umukiriya ni igitekerezo cya vuba aha.
D.Igisubizo cy'umukiriya cyari igitekerezo cy'ubu.
GivenAnswer:
Nkurikije ibisobanuro wamparishije, igisubizo kiza ari C. Igisubizo cy'umukiriya ni igitekerezo cya vuba aha.

Impamvu zingana izi:

1. Umukiriya yavuze ko atari we ubwemwe wabonye umugore agenda mu kibuga, ahubwo ari umukobwa we wamubwiye ko yabonye umugore agenda hejuru y'inkweto. Ibi biramutse bitari ukuri, umukiriya atari afite ubushishozi bwo kubona icyatumye umugore agwa.

2. Igisubizo cye cyo kuvuga ko "yaguye kubera ko yaguye ku mufuka" ntibyumvikana kandi ntibigaragara ko cyashingiye ku bumenyi bw'ibanze bwo kumenya impamvu z'ugutandara.

3. Igisubizo cye kigaragara ko ari igitekerezo cya vuba aha, cyashingiye ku nkuru ye yumvise, atari ku byo yabonye ubwe.

Bityo, umucamanza arenze ku cyemezo cy'umushinjacyaha kandi yemerera igisubizo cy'umukiriya guhagarara, birashoboka cyane ko biterwa n'uko igisubizo cy'umukiriya ari igitekerezo cya vuba aha, atari ukuri gushingiye ku byo yabonye ubwe.

Question:
Ni ikihe muri ibi bikurikira kigaragaza imyitwarire myiza y'imibonano mpuzabitsina ku bijyanye n'imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari
A.Abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu bihe byose.
B.Abahanga mu by'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu gihe cy'umwaka umwe nyuma yo guhagarika ubuvuzi.
C.Abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu bihe bimwe na bimwe (urugero, mu gihe hari ibyago byo gukoreshwa nabi).
D.Abahanga mu by'imitekerereze y'abantu ntibabujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi.
GivenAnswer:
Igisubizo kirambuye ni iyi C:

"Abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu bihe bimwe na bimwe (urugero, mu gihe hari ibyago byo gukoreshwa nabi)."

Iyi mvugo igaragaza imyitwarire myiza ku bijyanye n'imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu n'abahoze ari abakiriya babo. Ibabujije gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina iyo hari ibyago byo gukoreshwa nabi, ariko ntibabujije iyo nta byago biriho. Ibi ni ngombwa kugira ngo habeho ubushishozi mu mahame y'akazi no kubungabunga isura nziza y'ubuhanga.

Igisubizo A "Abahanga mu bijyanye n'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu bihe byose" ntirigaragaza imyitwarire myiza kuko ari bwo burundu.

Igisubizo B "Abahanga mu by'imitekerereze y'abantu babujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi mu gihe cy'umwaka umwe nyuma yo guhagarika ubuvuzi" ntikigaragaza imyitwarire myiza kuko umwaka umwe ushobora kuba munini cyangwa muto kurusha agaciro.

Igisubizo D "Abahanga mu by'imitekerereze y'abantu ntibabujijwe gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina n'abahoze ari abakiriya b'ubuvuzi" ntirigaragaza imyitwarire myiza kuko bidashobora kwirengagiza ibyago byo gukoreshwa nabi.

Question:
Mbere y'uko icyemezo cyo guhuza imijyi ibiri cyashyizwe mu matora, umushinjacyaha mukuru wa leta yasohoye igitekerezo cy'inama avuga ko icyo cyemezo kinyuranyije n'amategeko cyangwa itegeko nshinga. Nyuma y'aho, icyo cyemezo cyashyizwe mu matora kandi cyemejwe n'abaturage benshi mu mijyi yombi. Nyuma y'amatora, ariko mbere y'uko iryo shyirahamwe rihuzwa ku mugaragaro, abakoresha imisoro babiri bo muri umwe mu mijyi batangiye ikirego cyo gushimisha ubumwe, bagatera itegeko nshinga ry'icyo gitekerezo. Uru rubanza rwageze mu Rukiko rw'Ikirenga rw'igihugu kandi rwagaragaye ko runyuranyije n'itegeko nshinga hakurikijwe amategeko ya leta n'ay'igihugu. Ubu ubushinjacyaha bwatanze ikirego cyo gusaba ko uru rubanza rusuzumwa n'Urukiko rw'Ikirenga rwa Amerika. Ikipe y'igihugu y'u Rwanda ishobora
A.Nta n'umwe wabyumvise, kuko icyemezo cyafashwe ku mpamvu z'ubwigenge bw'igihugu.
B.Ntabwo yumva urubanza, ariko ashobora kuba yarasubijwe mu rukiko rw'akarere.
C.Umva ibibazo by'abaturage, ariko reka kuvuga ku kibazo cy'igihugu.
D.1.1.1.1.2.2.2.2.2.2.21.2016 2016 Inkiko z'u Rwanda ziyobowe n'umushinjacyaha mukuru w'iki gihugu, kandi ntiziteze kumva icyo kibazo.
GivenAnswer:
Igihe habayeho ikibazo cy'amategeko cyerekeranye n'imikorere ya leta, hari inzira zikurikizwa kugira ngo kinogerwe umuti uhuje n'amategeko. Mu gihe cy'ikibazo cy'ubumwe bw'imijyi, hari inzego zinyuranye zishobora kugira uruhare:

A. Urukiko rw'Ikirenga rw'igihugu rushobora kuba rwamaze kuburengerera kandi rugasuzuma niba ryubahirije itegeko nshinga rya leta. Iyo rugaragaje ko ryubahirije amategeko, icyemezo cyashyizweho gituma ubumwe bw'imijyi bwemezwa.

B. Iyo Urukiko rw'Ikirenga rw'igihugu rugaragaje ko ubumwe bw'imijyi bunyuranyije n'itegeko nshinga, hashobora kuba hari inzira yo gusaba Urukiko rw'Ikirenga rwa Amerika kugira icyo ruvuga ku kibazo.

C. Ubushinjacyaha bwa leta bufite inshingano yo kurengera amategeko, rero bushobora kuba bwatanze ikirego cyo gusaba Urukiko rw'Ikirenga rwa Amerika kugenzura icyemezo cy'ubumwe bw'imijyi.

D. Abakoresha imisoro bo muri umwe mu mijyi bashobora kuba baratanze ikirego cyo gushimisha ubumwe bw'imijyi, bateye itegeko nshinga ry'icyo cyemezo.

Muri rusange, igihe habayeho ikibazo cy'amategeko gikomeye nk'icyo, inzego z'ubutabera zikurikiza inzira zitandukanye kugira ngo kinogerwe umuti uhuje n'amategeko, zikanagendera ku mategeko y'igihugu n'ay'inkunga.
